title: Best of The Herd: 11/19/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/19/2018
description:
Colin has some bad news for Bears fans that they might not want to admit themselves. He thinks the Cowboys are setting up to be that one bad playoff team that doesn't fit with the others. He admits where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, former Pro Bowl QB Michael Vick comes in studio to talk about QBs fighting with coaches and why Lamar Jackson's running success isn't sustainable. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
